SELECT c.FLT_TIME FLT_TIME, c.REFUEL_TIME_DIFFERENCE_1 REFUEL_TIME_DIFFERENCE_1, c.REFUEL_TIME_DIFFERENCE_2 REFUEL_TIME_DIFFERENCE_2, c.OIL_CONSUME_RATE_1 OIL_CONSUME_RATE_1, c.OIL_CONSUME_RATE_2 OIL_CONSUME_RATE_2, p.TAIL TAIL, p.H_HIGHLAND H_HIGHLAND, p.OPERATER OPERATER, d.NAME DUTYNAME FROM ehm_data_sap_oil_consumption c LEFT JOIN ehm_data_plane p on c.PLANE_ID = p.ID LEFT JOIN ehm_duty d on c.DUTY = d.ID WHERE p.OPERATER LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{operater, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
AND c.DUTY = #{duty, jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT c.FLT_TIME FLT_TIME, c.REFUEL_TIME_DIFFERENCE_1 REFUEL_TIME_DIFFERENCE_1, c.REFUEL_TIME_DIFFERENCE_2 REFUEL_TIME_DIFFERENCE_2, c.OIL_CONSUME_RATE_1 OIL_CONSUME_RATE_1, c.OIL_CONSUME_RATE_2 OIL_CONSUME_RATE_2, p.TAIL TAIL, p.H_HIGHLAND H_HIGHLAND, p.OPERATER OPERATER, d.NAME DUTYNAME FROM ehm_data_sap_oil_consumption c LEFT JOIN ehm_data_plane p on c.PLANE_ID = p.ID LEFT JOIN ehm_duty d on c.DUTY = d.ID WHERE 1 = 1
AND p.TAIL = #{tail}
